name: RTF Creator
description: Generate valid RTF (Rich Text Format) documents from scratch. Produces formatted documents compatible with Word, LibreOffice, and other word processors.
author: EnhanceClaude
overview: This skill generates structurally valid RTF documents with full support for character formatting, paragraph styling, tables, headers/footers, hyperlinks, and page setup. It includes comprehensive reference material for RTF control words and a built-in validation step using rtfparse to catch unbalanced braces and structural errors before delivery.
customInstructions: Optional: pip install rtfparse for validation.
promptSuggestions: Create an RTF document with a title, two sections, and a table of data
Convert this markdown content into a formatted RTF file I can open in Word
Generate an RTF report with a header, footer with page numbers, and bold section headings
Make an RTF memo with the company name centered at the top and body text in Times New Roman 12pt
applications: Generating formatted reports for Word or LibreOffice
Creating templated business documents (memos, letters, contracts)
Producing RTF output from structured data or AI-generated content
Building documents with tables, headers, and custom fonts without a word processor
Converting plain text or markdown to a shareable formatted file
